verbose_text: XREF_FIG displays transglycosylation of acarbose hydrolytic products to methyl-alpha-D-glucopyranoside (MG), mannitol (ML), xylitol (XL), xylose (X), rhamnose (R) and sucrose (S) by Gt-Mamy (XREF_FIG, lanes 5-7), while Gt-MamyT does not exhibit any transglycosylation activity, although it hydrolyzes acarbose to G1 and PTS (XREF_FIG, lanes 8-10; XREF_FIG, lanes 7-9).
